title: Soldier in the Rain - 1963.avi
description:
Jackie Gleason, Steve McQueen, Tuesday Weld, Tom Poston. Sigh...... so many great ones including "The Great One" himself.  Most gone now but not forgotten.

A story about an experienced sargeant and the soldier he "guides" along.

A classic. Funny, touching, and some tugs at the heart strings.  A must see and a must for the classic collection.

This was requested almost a year ago.  Finally found, dl&#039;d, watched, remembered.  Here you go.

Wide screen, black and white, english, no subs, I think it is very high quality VHS or DVD at a slightly lower than usual resolution.  Slightly off if expanded to 22" wide screen display.  Absolutely does not get in the way of watchability.

IMDB:
The bond of friendship between a worldly-wise Army Master Sergeant and his naive worshiper.
